website_summaries.verdict: A vegan concealer that has many of the same benefits as pricier brands.
pros: Cruelty free and vegan with a creamy, lightweight formula
Made from natural minerals and Argan oil that moisturize the skin
Easy to blend and it is very pigmented
cons: Some say it doesn't last very long

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Concealer!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased this concealer in three shades! I love the ingredient list AND it works better than any other concealer I've used. Concealers will typically settle into my fine lines (under my eyes), but this sets perfectly with powder. (If you don't get much creasing, you might not need to set it at all!) Incredibly lightweight (you won't notice it on your skin), easy to blend (I use my fingers), not too creamy, and very pigmented. I had previously purchased it on a 'clean beauty' site, but this is much more convenient. Would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best concealer in both the traditional and green beauty world! It is full coverage and I was skeptical that it would hold up to my NARS concealer. But it did and works better without feeling heavy. Plus the price point is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I originally bought the Burt’s Bees concealer from Ulta, and hated it and decided I needed to get something that was worth my money. I had never used this brand before and decided to give it a try knowing it was cruelty free, and I love it! Blends out so well with a beauty blender!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Vasquez-Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!!  Blends seamlessly!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealor!! Lasts forever! On, and even the amount in the tube. I’m still on my first, and I keep thinking it’s going to run out soon, so I re-ordered, but still so much left. Probably because you don’t need much to get the perfection needed from this mighty product! Double-bonus for being clean!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The Clove & Hallow concealer went on nicely. I bought the #02. I thought, because my skin tone is light this color would be the best. After putting the concealer on, I wished I had bought the color that had more yellow tones to it. Next time, I will get a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer! It is a great non-toxic alternative conventional full coverage products. Doesn’t cake or crease. Unlike another reviewer said, I personally think this is great for acne scars. Probably sits better on top of a satin/matte foundation vs. a more dewy foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, however, it runs out very quickly for the cost. I’m fairly sure I received a bottle that was already used because I’m almost out and I’ve only had it for a few weeks and use it 2-3 times a week. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Thomas

customer_reviews.title: good concealer but not great for under eye
customer_reviews.text: creamy and easy to apply. It only minimally covers dark circles
customer_reviews.author: L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just a bad batch of a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: . BOTH the 12 and 13 that I received were dried out and appeared to be either used or old. I will NOT order this product again here. I would encourage you to try the product just not ordering here. Sad because it was quick to receive. I wasted $40 on DRIED/PASTY make-up with a damaged dry applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Sharhonda L. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Covers dark under eyes pretty well along with spot concealing. I’d say this is pretty full coverage and doesn’t feel heavy on the skin. It can look a little dry at times so I’d definitely use a moisturizer underneath. Not sure if I’d repurchase, I haven’t had issues with this breaking me out but I’m trying to stay away from products with coconut in them.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Not for concealing dark circles
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that this product was all natural and organic and I think it works OK for blemish concealing, but my main use was for under eye circles and this did not cover very well at all. It mainly sat on top of the skin and looked very chalky. Tried several different methods to rub it in, with finger, brush, sponge and it still didn't blend into the skin very well. Was really wanting to love it, but unfortunately it didn't work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best and most affordable clean concealer
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this concealer so much. It's a dupe of NARS, without the chemicals. The formula is creamy and has a medium, matte coverage finish. I always put on the concealer first without blending, then do my eyebrows to let the concealer set a little bit. When done with eyebrows, I then blend out the concealer. I also finish the concealer with setting powder to help it last longer. One tube lasts me about 6 months. Only wish is that they had more shades.
customer_reviews.author: ajy

customer_reviews.title: Texture is Too Thin, and Product Amount Seems Low
customer_reviews.text: The thin texture spreads nicely, but it could use a bit of thickness. The first tube I bought lasted for about 6 to 8 times, and it was already running low. For $20., I wish the manufacturer would add more product to the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This concealer provides good coverage - I don't have bad dark under eye circles, just a little discoloration. I took one star off because I wish it would stay in place longer. I got the shade 02 and I have fair/light neutral skin tone and that color was a good match.
customer_reviews.author: Landen

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer for sensitive, acne prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many concealers. This one is a winner, from package to performance. The before and after pictures of the young lady covering acne shown in the ad are no joke. It works!
customer_reviews.author: pHoeniX067

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for fair/light skin!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has very light skin color and has trouble finding a concealer for under her eyes and sensitive skin and blemish coverage. This is the one! She's so happy with the color and the look and doesn't irritate her skin at all!
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This product I thought was to dark and coverage wasn't what I expected but it does realy even out skin tone and the darker color adds a bronze glow and it lasts very long I have realy liked it and would repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Laura Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This concealer feels great, covers well, doesn’t look fake, and doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: This gave me heavy eyes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way this concealer went on but it made my eyes feel so heavy to the point where my eyes ached and my head ached. It's a shame because I think it can work for some people, just not me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Great concealer. My undereyes are definitely a trouble spot for me, but with this I can easily cover them up. I don’t wear any foundation or powder & it blends in with my skin perfectly. I will definitely be using this product then buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Great concealer, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful concealer and recommend for those who aren’t even looking for organic make up. It goes on smoothly and the color is as shown. This is a must have for my make up bag!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer but this particular product has been opened and the product was everywhere, I don't recommend buying this from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite concealer I’ve ever used and I’ve tried hundreds. The best part is it being natural. I have perioral dermatitis and it finally started to go away after three months of using clove + hallow! I would choose this over shape tape or MAC any day now!
customer_reviews.author: Laikyn

customer_reviews.title: Great color, Bad creasing
customer_reviews.text: The color was spot onnnn for me, which is why I was bummed that the creasing was insane. It started to crease under my eyes and in my forehead as I was putting it on. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage & easy use.
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage & easy use. I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Max Rose

customer_reviews.title: USED!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived USED! Although the box seemed normal, the wand was used - there was concealer around the outside neck of the tube. Very disappointed. Returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: lstewart

customer_reviews.title: Covers very well.
customer_reviews.text: It is so effective that I almost could wear it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchencapers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Worst concealer I have ever used! It did everything they claim it won’t! It creased, caked and flaked! It covers well but then is impossible to blend in or get rid of the cakey obvious concealer look
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Coverage is great, and it makes my face look smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Santillo

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is lovely. Works, and covers fine lines, without looking cake-y. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Korey H. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this, feels weightless on my face, it gives good coverage but does not stay on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa dillree

customer_reviews.title: Best clean beauty concealer
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many green beauty concealers in the market and this one is a favorite. Easy to blend, does not crease and no setting needed.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage but may dry out your skin...
customer_reviews.text: Nice coverage, feels light...but it dried out my skin under my eyes, for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Color may vary from what is shown
customer_reviews.text: The color was more pinkish in real life than was shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cenza Ferrante

customer_reviews.title: Clean and no creasing under eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic concealer. I have tried a TON of concealers for under the eye and this one is the perfect balance of a bit hydrating but not too much so that it is emollient and creases. Minimal to no creasing and my undereyes typically crease with 90% of other concealer I’ve tried. Best of all, it is non toxic. I had been searching for a non creasing clean concealer for a while and I finally found it!
customer_reviews.author: pinktable

customer_reviews.title: Natural and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pale with near translucent under eye skin. This concealer covers my blue veins, dark under eye, redness around the nose, blends perfectly, lasts for more than 10 hrs, and doesn't highlight my wrinkles. It's perfect and non toxic. Rare find indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived half empty
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I received a half-empty tube of concealer. It looks used! I am in the process of returning. Blows me away they are having me return this item, probably to resell. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Audra B. Canida

customer_reviews.title: Vegan natural and cruelty free concealer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this concealer as I was looking for one without a lot of harmful ingredients and this one fell into that category. I was pleasantly surprised at how smoothly it goes on and the coverage you get with it. I have dark under eye circles and an age spot. It covered both nicely. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Granm

customer_reviews.title: didnt have much coverage and seemed thin
customer_reviews.text: formula seemed thin and creased on my undereye area. unfortunately not a hit for me
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Green beauty at its finest!
customer_reviews.text: I love the light airy feel on my oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer out there. I'm amazed the ingredients are so clean
customer_reviews.author: Johnson's

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, but more liquidy consistency. Does have enough powder for coverage. Using under the eye.
customer_reviews.author: mistie

product_meta.title: CLOVE + HALLOW Conceal + Correct - Vegan Natural Cruelty Free Concealer Makeup Stick - 01
feature_bullets: A CLEAN CONCEALER THAT ACTUALLY COVERS all natural concealer by CLOVE + HALLOW has a base of natural minerals and argan oil that seamlessly disguises imperfections and under eye circles
NEVER CREASES OR CAKES use as a natural under eye concealer without fear of it settling into lines, or apply over blemishes with zero cakiness
IMPROVES SKIN OVER TIME natural makeup with real skin benefits, thanks to hydrating and softening argan oil and vitamin E
EASY, HANDS-FREE APPLICATION unlike most cruelty free organic makeup, this concealer comes with a wand applicator for precision and cleanliness
SHADES FOR EVERY SKIN TONE like all of CLOVE + HALLOW’s organic cosmetics, this cruelty free concealer is universally flattering and comes in 10 shades
